improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error.  The value of y becomes 0 when x is odd.  The program should add a check to ensure y is not zero before performing the division.
The variable x is modified in the loop but is not used to affect control flow, reducing readability and possibly hindering optimization.
The modulo operation in the if condition may be costly.  Consider re-writing this logic to avoid the modulo operation for better performance.
